longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of passports issued by
Maldives can obtain a visa on arrival at Nouakchott (NKC). 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here and for passengers staying in
Mauritania for longer than 2 weeks. 

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age. 
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers over 9
  months of age traveling to areas south of the Sahara Desert.
  
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country,
  except Dakhlet-Nouadhibou and Tiris-Zemour. In Adrar and
  Inchiri there is malaria risk during the rainy season (July
  through October). Recommended prevention in risk areas: C.
